definitions.definition: A result that one is attempting to achieve .
examples: My lifelong goal is to get into a Hollywood movie.
She failed in her goal to become captain of the team.

definitions.definition: In many sports , an area into which the players attempt to put an object.
examples: The racers are approaching the goal .
The ball rolled slowly into the goal .

definitions.definition: The act of placing the object into the goal.
A point scored in a game as a result of placing the object into the goal.
A noun or noun phrase that receives the action of a verb. The subject of a passive verb or the direct object of an active verb. Also called a patient , target , or undergoer .

main_definition: A result that one is attempting to achieve .
secondary_definitions: ( sports ) In many sports , an area into which the players attempt to put an object.
( sports ) The act of placing the object into the goal.
A point scored in a game as a result of placing the object into the goal.

( linguistics , grammar ) A noun or noun phrase that receives the action of a verb. The subject of a passive verb or the direct object of an active verb. Also called a patient , target , or undergoer .
